verses.verse: וַתִּשָּׂא֙ <S%H5375><s%> lifted up כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָ֣עֵדָ֔ה <S%H5712><s%> And all the congregation וַֽיִּתְּנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> and cried אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קוֹלָ֑ם <S%H6963><s%> their voice וַיִּבְכּ֥וּ <S%H1058><s%> wept הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> and the people בַּלַּ֥יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> that night הַהֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וַיִּלֹּ֙נוּ֙ <S%H3885><s%> murmured עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> against Moses וְעַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> against אַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> and against Aaron כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> All בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַֽיֹּאמְר֨וּ <S%H559><s%> said אֲלֵהֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> and to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole הָעֵדָ֗ה <S%H5712><s%> and the whole congregation לוּ־ <S%H3863><s%> unto them Would God מַ֙תְנוּ֙ <S%H4191><s%> that we had died בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt א֛וֹ <S%H176><s%> Or בַּמִּדְבָּ֥ר <S%H4057><s%> in this wilderness הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this לוּ־ <S%H3863><s%> or would God מָֽתְנוּ׃ <S%H4191><s%> we had died

וְלָמָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> Why יְ֠הוָה <S%H3068><s%> And wherefore hath the LORD מֵבִ֨יא <S%H935><s%> brought אֹתָ֜נוּ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> unto הָאָ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> us unto this land הַזֹּאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> likewise לִנְפֹּ֣ל <S%H5307><s%> to fall בַּחֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword נָשֵׁ֥ינוּ <S%H802><s%> that our wives וְטַפֵּ֖נוּ <S%H2945><s%> and our children יִהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> will become לָבַ֑ז <S%H957><s%> plunder הֲל֧וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not ט֦וֹב <S%H2896><s%> not be better לָ֖נוּ שׁ֥וּב <S%H7725><s%> for us to return מִצְרָֽיְמָה׃ <S%H4714><s%> Egypt

וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> And they said אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אָחִ֑יו <S%H251><s%> to another נִתְּנָ֥ה <S%H5414><s%> Let us make רֹ֖אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> a captain וְנָשׁ֥וּבָה <S%H7725><s%> and let us return מִצְרָֽיְמָה׃ <S%H4714><s%> into Egypt

וַיִּפֹּ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> fell מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> Then Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> on their faces לִפְנֵ֕י <S%H6440><s%> before כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all קְהַ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> all the assembly עֲדַ֖ת <S%H5712><s%> of the congregation בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וִיהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua בִּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נ֗וּן <S%H5126><s%> of Nun וְכָלֵב֙ <S%H3612><s%> and Caleb בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְפֻנֶּ֔ה <S%H3312><s%> of Jephunneh מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> who הַתָּרִ֖ים <S%H8446><s%> [which were] of them that searched אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land קָרְע֖וּ <S%H7167><s%> rent בִּגְדֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H899><s%> their clothes

וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> And they spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲדַ֥ת <S%H5712><s%> unto all the company בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> The land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which עָבַ֤רְנוּ <S%H5674><s%> which we passed בָהּ֙ לָת֣וּר <S%H8446><s%> through to search אֹתָ֔הּ <S%H853><s%> טוֹבָ֥ה <S%H2896><s%> good הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land מְאֹ֥ד <S%H3966><s%> is an exceedingly מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> is an exceedingly

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If חָפֵ֥ץ <S%H2654><s%> delight בָּ֙נוּ֙ יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> If the LORD וְהֵבִ֤יא <S%H935><s%> in us then he will bring אֹתָ֙נוּ֙ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> unto הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> us into this land הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וּנְתָנָ֖הּ <S%H5414><s%> and give לָ֑נוּ אֶ֕רֶץ <S%H776><s%> it us a land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הִ֛וא <S%H1931><s%> he זָבַ֥ת <S%H2100><s%> which floweth חָלָ֖ב <S%H2461><s%> with milk וּדְבָֽשׁ׃ <S%H1706><s%> and honey

אַ֣ךְ <S%H389><s%> Only בַּֽיהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> not ye against the LORD אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּמְרֹדוּ֒ <S%H4775><s%> Only rebel וְאַתֶּ֗ם <S%H859><s%> and do אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּֽירְאוּ֙ <S%H3372><s%> neither fear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> ye the people הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for לַחְמֵ֖נוּ <S%H3899><s%> for they [are] bread הֵ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> like סָ֣ר <S%H5493><s%> is departed צִלָּ֧ם <S%H6738><s%> for us their defence מֵעֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H5921><s%> and וַֽיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> from them and the LORD אִתָּ֖נוּ <S%H854><s%> do אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּירָאֻֽם׃ <S%H3372><s%> [is] with us fear

וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> bade כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָ֣עֵדָ֔ה <S%H5712><s%> But all the congregation לִרְגּ֥וֹם <S%H7275><s%> stone אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> בָּאֲבָנִ֑ים <S%H68><s%> them with stones וּכְב֣וֹד <S%H3519><s%> And the glory יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD נִרְאָה֙ <S%H7200><s%> appeared בְּאֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> in the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> before all the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel פ

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> long אָ֥נָה <S%H579><s%> befall יְנַאֲצֻ֖נִי <S%H5006><s%> provoke הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> How long will this people הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> will this וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> long אָ֙נָה֙ <S%H579><s%> befall לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> me? and how long will it be ere יַאֲמִ֣ינוּ <S%H539><s%> they believe בִ֔י בְּכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all הָֽאֹת֔וֹת <S%H226><s%> me for all the signs אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשִׂ֖יתִי <S%H6213><s%> which I have shewed בְּקִרְבּֽוֹ׃ <S%H7130><s%> among

אַכֶּ֥נּוּ <S%H5221><s%> I will smite בַדֶּ֖בֶר <S%H1698><s%> them with the pestilence וְאוֹרִשֶׁ֑נּוּ <S%H3423><s%> and disinherit וְאֶֽעֱשֶׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> them and will make אֹֽתְךָ֔ <S%H853><s%> לְגוֹי־ <S%H1471><s%> nation גָּד֥וֹל <S%H1419><s%> of thee a greater וְעָצ֖וּם <S%H6099><s%> and mightier מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> than

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וְשָׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> shall hear מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הֶעֱלִ֧יתָ <S%H5927><s%> [it] (for thou broughtest up בְכֹחֲךָ֛ <S%H3581><s%> in thy might אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> this people הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this מִקִּרְבּֽוֹ׃ <S%H7130><s%> from among

וְאָמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> And they will tell אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יוֹשֵׁב֮ <S%H3427><s%> [it] to the inhabitants הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of this land הַזֹּאת֒ <S%H2063><s%> They שָֽׁמְעוּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> [for] they have heard כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you O יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> that thou LORD בְּקֶ֖רֶב <S%H7130><s%> [art] among הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> this people הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> of this אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after עַ֨יִן <S%H5869><s%> face בְּעַ֜יִן <S%H5869><s%> to face נִרְאָ֣ה ׀ <S%H7200><s%> art seen אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> O יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> that thou LORD וַעֲנָֽנְךָ֙ <S%H6051><s%> and [that] thy cloud עֹמֵ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> standeth עֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> over וּבְעַמֻּ֣ד <S%H5982><s%> in a pillar עָנָ֗ן <S%H6051><s%> of a cloud אַתָּ֨ה <S%H859><s%> and You הֹלֵ֤ךְ <S%H1980><s%> over them and [that] thou goest לִפְנֵיהֶם֙ <S%H6440><s%> before יוֹמָ֔ם <S%H3119><s%> them by day time וּבְעַמּ֥וּד <S%H5982><s%> and in a pillar אֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> of fire לָֽיְלָה׃ <S%H3915><s%> by night

וְהֵמַתָּ֛ה <S%H4191><s%> Now [if] thou shalt kill אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> [all] this people הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this כְּאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> as one וְאָֽמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> of thee will speak הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> then the nations אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who שָׁמְע֥וּ <S%H8085><s%> which have heard אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> שִׁמְעֲךָ֖ <S%H8088><s%> the fame לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

מִבִּלְתִּ֞י <S%H1115><s%> was not יְכֹ֣לֶת <S%H3201><s%> able יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Because the LORD לְהָבִיא֙ <S%H935><s%> to bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> this people הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נִשְׁבַּ֣ע <S%H7650><s%> which he sware לָהֶ֑ם וַיִּשְׁחָטֵ֖ם <S%H7819><s%> unto them therefore he hath slain בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> them in the wilderness

וְעַתָּ֕ה <S%H6258><s%> now יִגְדַּל־ <S%H1431><s%> be great נָ֖א <S%H4994><s%> pray כֹּ֣חַ <S%H3581><s%> And now I beseech thee let the power אֲדֹנָ֑י <S%H136><s%> of my Lord כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> according דִּבַּ֖רְתָּ <S%H1696><s%> as thou hast spoken לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֶ֤רֶךְ <S%H750><s%> is slow אַפַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H639><s%> to anger וְרַב־ <S%H7227><s%> and of great חֶ֔סֶד <S%H2617><s%> mercy נֹשֵׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> forgiving עָוֹ֖ן <S%H5771><s%> iniquity וָפָ֑שַׁע <S%H6588><s%> and transgression וְנַקֵּה֙ <S%H5352><s%> and by no means לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no יְנַקֶּ֔ה <S%H5352><s%> clearing פֹּקֵ֞ד <S%H6485><s%> [the guilty] visiting עֲוֹ֤ן <S%H5771><s%> the iniquity אָבוֹת֙ <S%H1><s%> of the fathers עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on בָּנִ֔ים <S%H1121><s%> upon the children עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto שִׁלֵּשִׁ֖ים <S%H8029><s%> unto the third וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and רִבֵּעִֽים׃ <S%H7256><s%> and fourth

סְלַֽח־ <S%H5545><s%> Pardon נָ֗א <S%H4994><s%> pray לַעֲוֹ֛ן <S%H5771><s%> I beseech thee the iniquity הָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> of this people הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> of this כְּגֹ֣דֶל <S%H1433><s%> according unto the greatness חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H2617><s%> of thy mercy וְכַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> you נָשָׂ֙אתָה֙ <S%H5375><s%> and as thou hast forgiven לָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> this people הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this מִמִּצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> from Egypt וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הֵֽנָּה׃ <S%H2008><s%> even until now
וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD סָלַ֖חְתִּי <S%H5545><s%> I have pardoned כִּדְבָרֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1697><s%> according to thy word

וְאוּלָ֖ם <S%H199><s%> But [as] truly חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> [as] I live אָ֑נִי <S%H589><s%> I וְיִמָּלֵ֥א <S%H4390><s%> shall be filled כְבוֹד־ <S%H3519><s%> with the glory יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> all the earth

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> Surely כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <S%H582><s%> Because all those men הָרֹאִ֤ים <S%H7200><s%> which have seen אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כְּבֹדִי֙ <S%H3519><s%> my glory וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֹ֣תֹתַ֔י <S%H226><s%> and my miracles אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which עָשִׂ֥יתִי <S%H6213><s%> which I did בְמִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> in Egypt וּבַמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> and in the wilderness וַיְנַסּ֣וּ <S%H5254><s%> have put אֹתִ֗י <S%H853><s%> זֶ֚ה <S%H2088><s%> these עֶ֣שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> me now these ten פְּעָמִ֔ים <S%H6471><s%> times וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not שָׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> and have not hearkened בְּקוֹלִֽי׃ <S%H6963><s%> to my voice

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Surely they shall not יִרְאוּ֙ <S%H7200><s%> see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נִשְׁבַּ֖עְתִּי <S%H7650><s%> which I sware לַאֲבֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> unto their fathers וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> shall any מְנַאֲצַ֖י <S%H5006><s%> neither shall any of them that provoked לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor יִרְאֽוּהָ׃ <S%H7200><s%> me see

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> For הָעֲמָלֵקִ֨י <S%H6003><s%> For the Amalekites וְהַכְּנַעֲנִ֥י <S%H3669><s%> and the Canaanites שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> will be there לִפְנֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> [are] there before וּנְפַלְתֶּ֖ם <S%H5307><s%> you and ye shall fall בֶּחָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> after that שַׁבְתֶּם֙ <S%H7725><s%> because ye are turned מֵאַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> away יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> from the LORD וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> therefore the LORD עִמָּכֶֽם׃ <S%H5973><s%> up

וַיַּעְפִּ֕לוּ <S%H6075><s%> But they presumed לַעֲל֖וֹת <S%H5927><s%> to go up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> top הָהָ֑ר <S%H2022><s%> unto the hill וַאֲר֤וֹן <S%H727><s%> nevertheless the ark בְּרִית־ <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וּמֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> and Moses לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> neither מָ֖שׁוּ <S%H4185><s%> departed מִקֶּ֥רֶב <S%H7130><s%> not out הַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4264><s%> of the camp

וַיֵּ֤רֶד <S%H3381><s%> came down הָעֲמָלֵקִי֙ <S%H6003><s%> Then the Amalekites וְהַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֔י <S%H3669><s%> and the Canaanites הַיֹּשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> which dwelt בָּהָ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> in that hill הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וַיַּכּ֥וּם <S%H5221><s%> and smote וַֽיַּכְּת֖וּם <S%H3807><s%> them and discomfited עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far הַֽחָרְמָֽה׃ <S%H2767><s%> them [even] unto Hormah פ
